grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 仰天【ギョウテン】being amazed, being horrified, being taken aback
仰角【ギョウカク】angle of elevation
景仰【ケイコウ】adoration, admiration, reverence
景仰【ケイコウ】adoration, admiration, reverence
欽仰【キンギョウ】reverence, adoration, veneration
kun reading compounds: 仰ぐ【あおぐ】to look up (at), to look up to, to respect, to revere, to ask for (e.g. guidance), to seek, to turn to (someone) for, to depend on, to rely on, to gulp down, to quaff, to drink
仰せ【おおせ】statement, command, wishes (of a superior)
仰せ言【おおせごと】statement, order
仰る【おっしゃる】to say, to speak, to tell, to talk
おっしゃる通り【おっしゃるとおり】I agree with you, it is as (someone) says
仰る【おっしゃる】to say, to speak, to tell, to talk
おっしゃる通り【おっしゃるとおり】I agree with you, it is as (someone) says
